column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Up to 3000 volunteers and private company staff
column4: led by Governor Kuoch Chamroeun began a campaign to clear the mountains of rubbish that line the streets of Sihanoukville on Saturday morning.------The governor called on all citizens
column6: to be proactive in the fight against waste in the city
column7: where hundreds of tons of trash is yet to be collected.------Photos from ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/91572
